name: Terraform (Plan + Apply)

on:
  # Infra code changes (plan only)
  push:
    branches: ["dev"]

  # Deploys triggered from app repo after image push
  repository_dispatch:
    types: [deploy-image]

permissions:
  id-token: write
  contents: read

env:
  AWS_REGION: ${{ vars.AWS_REGION }}

jobs:
  plan:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    env:
      # If dispatch, use payload env; if push to dev branch, default to dev
      TF_ENV: ${{ github.event_name == 'repository_dispatch' && github.event.client_payload.environment || 'dev' }}
      IMAGE_TAG: ${{ github.event.client_payload.image_tag }}

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure AWS (OIDC)
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          role-to-assume: ${{ secrets.AWS_ROLE_ARN }}
          aws-region: ${{ env.AWS_REGION }}

      - uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: "1.7.5"

      - name: Terraform Init
        run: terraform init

      - name: Select Workspace
        run: |
          terraform workspace select $TF_ENV || terraform workspace new $TF_ENV

      - name: Terraform Plan
        run: |
          terraform plan \
            -var-file="envs/$TF_ENV.tfvars" \
            $( [ -n "$IMAGE_TAG" ] && echo "-var=image_tag=$IMAGE_TAG" )

  apply_dev:
    needs: plan
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    # Only apply on dispatch AND when env is dev
    if: github.event_name == 'repository_dispatch' && github.event.client_payload.environment == 'dev'

    environment: dev

    env:
      TF_ENV: dev
      IMAGE_TAG: ${{ github.event.client_payload.image_tag }}

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure AWS (OIDC)
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          role-to-assume: ${{ secrets.AWS_ROLE_ARN }}
          aws-region: ${{ env.AWS_REGION }}

      - uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: "1.7.5"

      - name: Terraform Init
        run: terraform init

      - name: Select Workspace
        run: |
          terraform workspace select $TF_ENV || terraform workspace new $TF_ENV

      - name: Terraform Apply (dev auto)
        run: |
          terraform apply -auto-approve \
            -var-file="envs/$TF_ENV.tfvars" \
            -var="image_tag=$IMAGE_TAG"

  apply_prod:
    needs: plan
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    # Only apply on dispatch AND when env is prod
    if: github.event_name == 'repository_dispatch' && github.event.client_payload.environment == 'prod'

    # This is the manual approval gate (Required reviewers on prod env)
    environment: prod

    env:
      TF_ENV: prod
      IMAGE_TAG: ${{ github.event.client_payload.image_tag }}

    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Configure AWS (OIDC)
        uses: aws-actions/configure-aws-credentials@v4
        with:
          role-to-assume: ${{ secrets.AWS_ROLE_ARN }}
          aws-region: ${{ env.AWS_REGION }}

      - uses: hashicorp/setup-terraform@v3
        with:
          terraform_version: "1.7.5"

      - name: Terraform Init
        run: terraform init

      - name: Select Workspace
        run: |
          terraform workspace select $TF_ENV || terraform workspace new $TF_ENV

      - name: Terraform Apply (prod requires approval)
        run: |
          terraform apply -auto-approve \
            -var-file="envs/$TF_ENV.tfvars" \
            -var="image_tag=$IMAGE_TAG"
